name: GroupingInfo

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the field or bucket field that is used for row or column grouping.

methods.name: getSortOrder
methods.description: Returns the order that is used to sort data in a row or column grouping (ASCENDING or DESCENDING).

methods.name: getDateGranularity
methods.description: Returns the date interval that is used for row or column grouping.

methods.name: getSortAggregate
methods.description: Returns the summary field that is used to sort data within a grouping in a summary report. The value is null when data within a grouping is not sorted by a summary field.

description: Contains methods for describing fields that are used for grouping.
